statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00 AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity_in_stock < 10;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Chair%');
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier X';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE id = 100 AND supplier_name = 'SupplierABC';

DELETE FROM orders WHERE supplier_id = 50 AND quantity > 20
